additional_info:
Furniture, Built-in furniture, Technique, Telephone, Internet, Security, Window guards, Elevator, Heating system: gas, Hot water: electricity 
 For rent: solid 90's condo in Saburtalo neighborhood, near Red Garden, tennis court and football stadium. 1st experimental school of Tbilisi, and Music and arts school. 
The apartment is located on the 8th floor of a 14-storey building. The apartment is non standard project, which includes a large living room, one bedroom standard size and a second bedroom, a separate kitchen and loggia, which is currently used as an office, a bathroom and a balcony which looks at the mountainს. Apartment building has 24 hour security, one big lift and second smaller lift. The apartment can also be rented for a commercial / office purposes.
